title: Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - Ethanol Fire Pit, Fire Bowl, Mini Personal Fireplace for Indoor & Garden - Bio Ethanol Fuel
descriptions:
Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the perfect addition to your indoor and garden space! This mini personal fireplace is designed to create a warm and cosy atmosphere, making it ideal for gatherings or simply relaxing by the fire. 

Crafted with high-quality concrete in a stylish graphite color, this fire pit features a stunning marble effect base that not only adds a touch of elegance but also provides heat dissipation for your safety and comfort. 

Powered by bio ethanol fuel, this fire pit offers a burn time of over 1 hour, allowing you to enjoy the mesmerizing flames for longer. It is specifically designed to use Roundfire premium bioethanol fuels with safety flashback arrestors, ensuring a secure and hassle-free experience. 

Safety is our top priority, which is why this fire pit is equipped with a stainless steel burn cup material, rapid cooling of the burn chamber, and a flat stainless steel extinguisher tool. You can rest assured that you and your loved ones are protected at all times.

Not only is this fire pit portable, making it easy to move around and place wherever you desire, but it also serves multiple purposes. Use it as a stunning table decor piece or take advantage of its cooking capabilities by roasting smores and marshmallows. 

Create a captivating atmosphere with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit. Its sleek design, functionality, and safety features make it a must-have for any indoor or garden space. Plus, with the ceramic wool insert, you can increase burn time and efficiency for even more enjoyment. Don't miss out on this exceptional addition to your home - order yours today!

Introducing the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the perfect addition to your indoor or outdoor space! This mini personal fireplace is designed to create a warm and cosy atmosphere, making it ideal for gatherings, relaxation, or simply adding a touch of elegance to your table decor.

Crafted with high-quality concrete in a beautiful graphite color, this fire pit features a stunning marble effect base that not only adds a touch of sophistication but also provides excellent heat dissipation, ensuring your safety and comfort.

With its fuel type of Bio Ethanol, you can enjoy the mesmerizing flames without the hassle or mess of traditional fire pits. Our fire pit is specifically designed for use with Roundfire premium bioethanol fuels, which come with safety flashback arrestors for your peace of mind.

Safety is our top priority, which is why our fire pit is equipped with stainless steel burn cups that prevent leaks and ensure a secure and controlled burn. The rapid cooling of the burn chamber and the inclusion of a flat stainless steel extinguisher tool further enhance the safety features of this product.

Not only is the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit safe and stylish, but it is also highly functional. With a burn time of over 1 hour, you can enjoy the warm glow for longer periods. Additionally, this fire pit doubles as a cooking tool, allowing you to create delicious treats like Smores and Marshmallows, adding a touch of fun to your gatherings.

Whether you choose to use it indoors or in your garden, this portable fire pit is the perfect companion for any occasion. Its compact size makes it easy to move and position wherever you desire, and its versatile usage environment allows you to enjoy the ambiance and warmth wherever you go.

To further enhance your experience, our fire pit includes a ceramic wool insert that increases burn time and efficiency, ensuring you get the most out of your fuel.

Upgrade your space with the Roundfire Concrete Tabletop Fire Pit - the epitome of elegance, safety, and functionality. Don't miss out on this must-have addition to your indoor and outdoor spaces. Order yours today and experience the magic of a warm and inviting atmosphere!
